member.name: T:Cenium.Framework.Logging.LogManager
member.summary: Exposes API for managing application wide logging. Default logging provider is set to NLog.

member.name: F:Cenium.Framework.Logging.LogManager.s_locker
member.summary: Used to synchronize access into utility methods.

member.name: M:Cenium.Framework.Logging.LogManager.IsLoggingEnabled
member.summary: Returns current status of logging service.
member.returns: true if logging is enabled otherwise false
